properties.areas of expertise: Women-specific support services and support groups; services for ex-offenders; designed gender-specific curricula; financial literacy information; work readiness services incorporating family strenthening strategies; women's empowerment and self-help seminars; networking workshops; microenterprise training; academic enhancement and GED preparation services; post-secondary education coaching; personal development coaching; transitional work experience opportunities

properties.company: Goodwill Industries of Greater New York and Northern New Jersey, Inc.
